ModMetaData.name: Dub's Electrolysis
ModMetaData.author: Sh0tybumbati
ModMetaData.description:
Adds electrolysis systems to Dub's Bad Hygiene for advanced power and oxygen generation.
Features: - Electrolysis chambers split water into hydrogen and oxygen - Three sizes: Small (500W), Medium (1500W), Large (3000W) - Separate pipe networks for O2 and H2 distribution - Hydrogen fuel cells for clean, efficient power generation - Oxygen pumps for Odyssey gravship support (optional DLC integration) - Automatic shutoff when storage is full - Long-term energy storage alternative to chemfuel
Requires Dub's Bad Hygiene. Optional integration with Odyssey DLC for oxygen pump functionality.
